name: QuantumGiz
description: A Tech Eshop focused on delivering a seamless, mobile-friendly user experience, showcasing skills in modern web development.

actionCards.title: Optimized for All Screen Sizes
actionCards.description: QuantumGiz is designed with a mobile-first approach, ensuring a seamless experience across all devices. The layout adapts effortlessly to smartphones, tablets, and desktops, providing an engaging interface regardless of screen size.

actionCards.title: Dynamic Shopping Cart & Gallery
actionCards.description: Built an intuitive shopping cart that allows real-time updates and a user-friendly product gallery. Users can easily browse items, apply filters, and track their selections in a streamlined manner, demonstrating a functional online shopping experience without actual payments.

actionCards.title: Wild Card Product Display & Recommendations
actionCards.description: Implemented a wild card feature for showcasing products, enabling a clean and organized layout that highlights various items. This card also includes recommendation sliders that suggest similar products, enhancing user engagement by presenting tailored options based on browsing behavior.
